/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -g   CMakeFiles/tutorial.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tutorial.dir/third_party/gl/src/gl_33.cpp.o  -o tutorial /usr/lib64/libGLU.so /usr/lib64/libGL.so third_party/glfw/src/libglfw3.a /usr/lib64/librt.so -lm -ldl /usr/lib64/libX11.so -lpthread /usr/lib64/libXrandr.so /usr/lib64/libXinerama.so /usr/lib64/libXxf86vm.so /usr/lib64/libXcursor.so
